Danny Page

 
  • Independent
  • Website
  • Twitter
  • Facebook

Danny Page is running for U.S. Senate
Back to races

Bio

I am a 39 year old blue collar worker. My wife Wendy and I have been married for 21 years and we have 6 living children. I work as an electrician by trade and we home school our children. We balance our budget on one middle income and live within our means. We serve in our church and I have served in the ministry as an evangelist, youth pastor, men's pastor, and pastor.

I believe that the Christian church has lost it's way and is bringing about the chastisement of the Lord upon this country which by His hand and direction was founded. Our only solution is to practice 2 Chronicles 7:14. Judgement must begin at the house of God and therefore the church must stop blaming the unbelievers.

I will serve as US Senator protecting the liberties of both the unbeliever and the believer. Government is no place for dictating beliefs or morality. Our rights are God given and the rights of the unbeliever must be protected as well. I will serve and not rule.

Health care

What should be done to address the country's health care system?

Repeal Obamacare and allow free markets to reign. Tort reform is a must! Nothing is free. socialized medicine doesn't work. Doctors and patients must work together for the good of the patient and the profit of the doctor.

If you oppose the Affordable Care Act or believe it should be modified, what are some of the alternatives you support?

Free markets

National security

What is the biggest threat to national security?

Open Borders

Should the U.S. play a greater role in international affairs?

Lesser in the terms of war and economic manipulation.

We can be a mediator but not an enforcer.

Do you support or oppose the Obama administration's military strategy against the Islamic State?

Oppose.

Energy

How can the U.S. ensure greater energy independence?

Drill in the US, build Keystone XL, and build refineries NOW.

Immigration

What is the biggest issue facing our current immigration system?

The governments of Mexico and Central America are corrupt and basically the people seek refuge in America. we need to turn our attentions to the third world mess that is on our Southern border and encourage the people of these lands to rise up and overcome the evil and corruption.

What policies or legislation do you support to address that issue?

Secure the border, NO amnesty!

Economy

What is the biggest issue facing the U.S. economy?

DEBT and the Federal Reserve's unkept mess.

What policies or legislation do you support to address that issue?

End the IRS and the income tax, repeal the 16th amendment and move to a merchant's tax or national sales tax such as the proposed FairTax

What spending cuts or changes to the tax code are needed to reduce the national debt?

End the Fed and balance the budget NOW

About this guide

There are more than 60 candidates in Hamilton County's Nov. 4 election. Over the past few weeks, Nooga.com sent the candidates brief surveys to help voters get a better understanding of the people who want to represent them in federal, state and local governments. Our guide also features easy-to-read breakdowns of the amendments and ballot measures you'll see on election day.
